# a [[ring]] or [[circle]] shape {{qualifier|such as a ring for a finger, or Saturn's rings}}

# a [[wheel]] {{qualifier|as of a vehicle}}

* {{sense|circle shape}} {{ja-r|丸|まる}}, {{ja-r|円形|えんけい}}

* {{sense|barrel hoop}} {{ja-r|箍|たが}}
* {{sense|vehicle wheel}} {{ja-r|車輪|しゃりん}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|たまき|yomi=k}}
Originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=たまき|手|tr1=ta|t1=hand|pos1=ancient combining form of modern ''te''|巻き|tr2=maki|t2=winding, wrapping|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|巻く}} ''maku'', “to wind, to wrap”}}, from the way that the bracelet would be worn around the wrist.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|たまき|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|手纏}}, {{ja-l|鐶}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|たまき}}

# an ancient [[bracelet]] strung with jewels or bells and worn at the elbow
# a longer tube-shaped [[gauntlet]] to protect the hand during [[archery]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=たまき|obsolete}} a ancient [[jewel]] or other [[stone]] in the shape of a ring

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|archery gauntlet}} {{ja-r|手覆|たおおい}}
* {{sense|ring}} {{ja-r|指輪|ゆびわ}}, {{lang|ja|環}} (''yubimaki'') {{qualifier|see below}}

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ゆびまき}}
Originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ゆびまき|指|tr1=yubi|t1=finger|pos1=ancient combining form of modern ''te''|巻き|tr2=maki|t2=winding, wrapping|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|巻く}} ''maku'', “to wind, to wrap”}}, from the way that the ring would be worn around a finger.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ゆびまき}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|指巻}}, {{ja-l|鐶}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ゆびまき}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ゆびまき|obsolete}} a ancient [[jewel]] or other [[stone]] in the shape of a ring

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|指輪|ゆびわ}}, {{lang|ja|環}} (''tamaki'') {{qualifier|see above}}
